GAME.TITLE: Safe Space
GAME.INFO: A game of cooperation and community in outer space

GAME.TITLE: queerspace?
GAME.CREDITS: by Eddie Cameron with a little help from some friends
GAME.INFO: Welcome to the Forbidden Zone. Fuck something.

GAME.TITLE: arpongi
GAME.INFO: A two player competitive game of pong, complete with experience points, gold, leveling up, units, buildings, upgrades, classes, and more!

GAME.TITLE: Conspiracy Theories About Myself
GAME.CREDITS: By Juno Morrow with music by Visager
GAME.INFO: A game about self-acceptance and navigating social anxiety. Cooperative game for two players (or one talented multitasker).

GAME.TITLE: OrbTown
GAME.INFO: A frenzied 2-player game of transposed identities that rewards subterfuge.

GAME.TITLE: a day at the beach
GAME.INFO: cute and relaxing, feat. background art by Bailey Steele

GAME.TITLE: Dream Hard
GAME.CREDITS: game by Robert Yang, music by Renim
GAME.INFO: A queer brawler defense game. Defend the Dreamhouse from thinly-veiled white supremacists, and look great while doing it.
